text.div:
Measles (Tests for measles virus Nucleic Acid)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    48508-6 Measles virus RNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    60422-3 Measles virus genotype [Identifier] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    7964-0 Measles virus RNA [Presence] in Nose by NAA with probe detection
    85798-7 Measles virus N gene [Cycle Threshold #] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    86575-8 Measles virus RNA [Presence] in Cerebral spinal fluid by NAA with probe detection
    86576-6 Measles virus RNA [Presence] in Serum by NAA with probe detection
    86577-4 Measles virus RNA [Presence] in Urine by NAA with probe detection
    88875-0 Measles virus genotype A vaccine strain N gene [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    88876-8 Measles virus genotype A vaccine strain N gene [Cycle Threshold #] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    91077-8 Measles virus RNA [Presence] in Upper respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection
    91132-1 Measles virus RNA [Presence] in Lower respiratory specimen by NAA with probe detection
